total_subquestions_ys: Q1: Identify the cells that have a non-zero value in the input grid.
Q2: For each non-zero cell, check if there are any non-zero cells in the same row.
Q3: If there are non-zero cells in the same row, replace the zero cells between them with the value of the non-zero cell.
Q4: Repeat the process for each row in the grid.
Q5: Generate the output grid by applying the changes from Q3 and Q4.

Q1: Identify the cells that have a non-zero value in the input grid.
Q2: For each non-zero cell, check if there are any non-zero cells in the same row.
Q3: If there are non-zero cells in the same row, replace the zero cells between them with the minimum value of the non-zero cells.
Q4: Repeat the process for each row in the grid to generate the output grid.
